mapper.sql: id, name, updateTime, physicalTableName, cid, state, showtype
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `tableinfo` where cid=#{id } order by id desc
select id from tableinfo where cid=#{cid} and physicalTableName=#{physicaltablename}
mapper.insert: insert into tableinfo (id, name, updateTime, physicalTableName, cid, state, showtype) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{physicaltablename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{showtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
